body.name: Kenmore DS4030 21.6V Cordless Stick Vacuum with EasyReach Wand, Lightweight Cleaner with 2-Speed Power Control, LED Headlight, Converts to Handheld for Hardwood Floors, Carpet & Pet Hair, Orange

features: CORDLESS STICK VACUUM: At less than 6 pounds this lightweight, versatile carpet and bare floor cleaner, with 2 speed settings, makes removing pet hair, cleaning up messes and eliminating dirt and dust quick and easy.Runtime: 40.0 minutes
EASYREACH WAND: Wand flexes to clean underneath furniture with the push of a button
50% MORE CAPACITY: Extra-large dust cup means you can cover more cleaning area without stopping to empty the dust cup
LESS THAN 6 POUNDS: The full vac, with nozzle and wand, weighs in at less than 6 pounds! With the detachable hand vac, the weight is less than 3 pounds

HEPA FILTRATION: HEPA filter adds an additional layer of filtration and captures 99.97% of dust, pet dander, pollen and more, down to 0.3 micron. Easy-to-empty transparent canister with washable filter saves time and money
2-SPEED SETTINGS: Choose between Low (ECO Mode) and High (Max mode) speed settings for quick and easy cleaning on tile, hardwood, linoleum and carpet
EXTENDED RUN TIME: Up to 40 minutes of suction along with a colorful LED battery status meter that indicates battery and charge level, motor speed, and more
CONVERT TO HANDVAC: Clean tight spaces, upholstery and more with the versatile detachable hand vacuum
LITHIUM-ION BATTERY: Rechargeable 21.6V battery features its own wall-mounted base, along with a portable adapter, and charges in less than 4 hours
VERSATILE TOOLS: Includes a Wall Mount & Combo Crevice/Dusting Brush
body.description: The Kenmore CSV | Go™ XL cordless stick vacuum with EasyReach™ Wand is feature packed at a price point that doesn’t break the bank. Featuring a featherlight construction at under 6lbs., a 50% larger dust cup* and a 40+ minute runtime**, this easy to use vacuum has the power to clean without interruption. No more bending down to clean underneath furniture, the EasyReach™ wand flexes with the push of a button for a whole home clean. Dust has nowhere to hide with our swivel steering system and LED headlight, while the LED battery indicator displays colorful lights to show battery and charge level, motor speed, & more. Designed for all surfaces and with a powerful 21.6V motor, this ‘go anywhere’ vacuum is all you need and nothing you don’t.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 9, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Works as Advertised
reviews.reviewText: Love having no cord to scrape the corners of my walls. Light and easy to get under furniture. Easy to clean and empty basket and filter. Great on my tile floors and very good on my rugs. Vacuum head is smaller (10.5 in.), so you’re pushing back and forth more, but you save time by not having to move furniture or moving plug around house.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 25, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Great vacuum - as long as your charging cord works
reviews.reviewText: Ordered the vacuum on a whim. It arrived 2 days later and was all it promised to be. We charged it once and then the charger cord died and wouldn’t hold a charge (verified by an electrician). This was within 3 weeks of having the vacuum. Tech support is sending me a new cord, but it’s back-ordered so they don’t know when it will be here and the recommended just buying a new cord off Amazon. So my husband did - except it never came (was marked as delivered). So I have a vacuum that I like - but I can’t use it now because I can’t charge it until we get another cord.For those who say the suction isn’t great - it isn’t. But the vacuum has 2 levels of suction. If you press the button on the top when it’s on, you get the high level of suction. It does not replace my big Dyson, but not having to pull my Dyson out as much is nice. And my ten year old will use this cordless one because it is lighter and quieter. It’s great for the cobwebs on the ceiling and ceiling fans! So as long as you can charge it, run and clean away!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 1, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Fantastic Vacuum, Comparable/More Affordable than Dyson
reviews.reviewText: I have owned this Kenmore vacuum cleaner for more than one year now, and it is a work horse. I use this light-weight vacuum multiple times a week and it does such a great job picking up pet hair, dander, dust, crumbs...you name it! I use it on both hardwood and carpet, as well as rugs, and it does a wonderful job. You can easily empty it after each use. I'm sure you can purchase filters for this vacuum but I just tap out anything in the filter and take an old toothbrush with soap and water to the filter to clean it. I let it air dry and pop it back in. No issues. The one downside I have noticed is that where the vacuum detaches to become handheld, the fitting is starting to loosen. I hope this eventually doesn't break before it's even been 5 years.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 5, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars A poor product that is impossible to get repairs done. Buyer Beware
reviews.reviewText: I bought this vacuum cleaner and the warranty through the company Amazon uses when you check out (prompts to purchase the coverage when you check out). The vacuum seemed to work at first. The battery life is definitely on the shorter side. It would run out pretty quickly on the high powered mode.One month into owning it, the suction stopped completely. It comes apart in a couple areas so I was able to look straight through the stick part, the canister, the filter, etc. There wasn't anything clogged anywhere. It just stopped picking up everything. Here's where it got ridiculous. I called the warranty company. They say they don't anything in the first year because there's a manufacturer warranty. So beware this plan doesn't help you AT ALL for at least one year. So they gave me Sears number. They said they manufactured it. So I call them and get a complete run around. They eventually say there's no techs in my area and to take it anywhere to be fixed. I asked if it would be covered under the manufacturer warranty and they hung up. I called back and was told the same thing and that there wasn't anything they would do to help. I asked for a supervisor to see if they could help further and the rep laughed and said they were in a meeting for 2 hours so I would be on hold a long time. I couldn't believe the lack of help. I searched on Sears website and found another 800 number to call for warranty issues. Called them and got an website to submit information for a claim. On that website there was another number to call if there's no techs in your area. I called them. They went through a long process and the representative told me there was a clog and I needed to find it. I told her I already looked clear though all parts and nothing was there. She hung up on me. I called back. Got another rep who emailed me a warranty claim form. This company was not Kenmore, Sears, or anything related to the warranty company I purchased. It was some unknown company and I was unsure if they were even the correct people I needed help from. They told me to cut the cord and send a picture of it. I didn't want to take a chance with a company that didn't manufactor or sell Kenmore products and get the warranty voided.I called Amazon and explained everything and they accepted the return and gave me a refund. Beware of the headache you will have trying to get this thing repaired. No one wanted to help. Amazon is amazing but Kenmore doesn't stand behind their product and the warranty you buy from the 3rd party on Amazon is worthless. Call Sears or Kenmore and try to see about getting your vacuum fixed under the warranty. The model number is in the Amazon title for the listing. You will see how impossible it is. Call the warranty company that Amazon uses as the 3rd party. Tell them you just bought it a month ago and they will tell you no coverage on it until the first year. You will see you will be suck with a broken item with no help, even with warranties covering it from 2 separate companies. It's a joke.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 7, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Powerful little machine
reviews.reviewText: Pros:Battery life lasted about 17 minutes on high, with the battery depleting ~25% every 5 minutes or so. It was enough for me to clean my 1200sqft house and vacuum cushions and baseboards.Great suction! It picked up pet hair, large crumbs, and fine dust particles with ease.Lightweight. It is too heavy and I had to switch hands but it wasn’t unbearable.The head of the vacuum swivels like crazy, and is easy to get into nooks and crannies.Cons:I don’t think it did as good of a job on carpet as it did on hardwood.I don’t think it will replace my corded vacuum, but this works well for every day cleaning.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 20, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Poor battery life
reviews.reviewText: Easy to assemble and it worked great for 20 minutes then the battery died. I wish I could get a replacement but can't seem to find anyone selling them. It died half way through cleaning my house which is only 1600 sq ft.It is quieter than my previous vacum the shark but the shark did have a replacement battery. This is also lighter than the shark but the other down size is the collection canister is smaller than the shark so had to empty it move often. I have a dog yhat sheds alot. It did mot clog and got the hair up. Would recommend for someone with a smaller house or apartment and no carpets. Works great on my hardwood floors but not so great on my rugs.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 18, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Decent and lightweight
reviews.reviewText: It has a nice look and is easy to push. Definitely lightweight. The dust cup is easy to empty. It is sleek so it fits into many tight corners and spaces. Can also be used as a hand vac. The suction is better than some vacuums but not as strong as I’d like. This vacuum is definitely good for tidying up and sweeping up crumbs…I just don’t really recommend it for deep cleaning thick carpets. It’s a very nice sweeper for hard floors and low pile carpets or rugs.
It’s very light and easy to maneuver but the suction is not very strong

I am very satisfied with the purchase I made. I wasn’t sure if I’d like this vacuum since I’ve only used heavy canister vacuums my life. It’s lightweight so it’s easy to carry and clean, it’s easy to charge, and has strong suction that leaves no dust around the house. Also very easy to disassemble and assemble.

reviews.reviewTitle: It’s a good vacuum with a few flaws
reviews.reviewText: I’ve used a couple of months now, and have noticed a few issues.Pros:- Has decent suction, the boost mode is great for carpet- The rotary head removes very easily for hair removal.- It’s very mobile and easy to use around furnitureCons:- The first one sent had a crevice tool that didn’t fit. Amazon made it right with stellar customer service.- The battery life was amazing for the first month of use, but has tapered off significantly. Like probably half of what it was as new.- The mounting base doesn’t have anything to hold the charger or crevice tool. Just a hook if you want to throw them in a bag. Kenmore missed the mark on that- You will need to buy replacement filters from time to time, depending on usage- It can’t be a full house vacuum for anything more than 1000 sq ft, and doesn’t quite get a deep enough clean compared to my Dyson.Overall, for the price, it does a great job for the daily maintenance from kids/pets but don’t have this one in mind to be an all-in-one vacuum.

reviews.reviewTitle: Wow! Very impressive for the price...
reviews.reviewText: I'm very happy with my purchase, I love how 'aesthetic' it is. I love that it mounts to the wall and can charge at the same time, the lights on the front are super helpful as well. It charges pretty quickly! Just all around happy with it as a mom of 4 young kids!
A full charge does my mother's whole house. About 2000 sqft. Impressive!Lightweight, easy to empty the dust cannister.Can remove the long handle for cleaning couches, cars, etc.
